message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to $1,150,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product to you. I'm open to discussing further, but I can't go lower than that.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,075,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me. Can you consider this price?
